column3: I've built this in Mac OS 10.7.5, but I'm afraid I can't see any visible effect it has. I'm going to poke at it a little more, though.\n
@L2G Do you right click on the icon? Should look like\n![Ohne Titel](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/901234/279445/260e8f36-9127-11e2-9391-72b13e88c2ea.png)\n
@Nerzahd So you say it is working with this patch? Or was that just a screen from when it worked ^^.\n
@Diapolo  yes. it works with your patch.\n
@Nerzahd Thanks for testing :).\n@laanwj Seems we have a working patch now, can you review?\n

I was confused, sorry. Still learning Qt's terminology as it relates to Mac OS's terminology, so I mistakenly thought the "tray icon menu" would be associated with the menu-bar icon and not the dock icon. But since the menu-bar icon is `#ifndef`'d right out of the build at present, I don't know why I thought that.\n\nWell, here, just in case someone cares whether more than one person could make it
